entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow early in the evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
